text: Ne mubo baliwo basinyisinjia Omurumwa, khulwokhuboola mbu; “Ye niweshirwi” Boola; “ eshirwi ni eshilayi khwinywe shichila mbu , Yasubila Nyasaye ne asubililanga abasuubili naye nitsimbambaasi khubalia abasuubila mwinywe. Ne balia basinyisinjia Omurumwa wa Nyasaye balanyoola eshinyasio eshilulu.’’
